title: The House of man. Part 1. Our changing environment
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and The Conservation Foundation
brief_description: A discussion of the rampant waste of natural resources in cities, woodlands, and farmlands, and of the pollution of rivers and the air. Compares the “progress” achieved thorugh wasteful methods, and through intelligent conservation techniques. Shows how intelligence can be channelled to plan for progress wisely.
